jyothisha katayuthu yanu janmapatha්raya kiyawa bala jiwana thorathuru pawasana shastha්rayak washayen saralawa sama kenekuma dath karanayaki.ese nami pa්rathamawa soya baliya yuththe kendaraya ,ha`dahana ,ෙwila pathkadaya, wani nami walinda ha`dinwena janmapatha්raya piliba`dawaya.janmapatha්raya yanu kenek upan ෙwilawa wana wita ema sthanayata adalawa udawa pawathina lagnayata anurupawa ga්rahayan ha rashi satahan kara eki janma mohothata anuwa thorathuru kiyawimata awashya thorathuru gananaya kara satahan kara athi lekhanaya washayen hadinwiya hakiya.mema lekhanaya sadima sa`daha awashya thorathuru sapaya gena aththe awidhimathwa ha awicharashiliwa nowana bawa pahatha wistharayen pahadili wanu atha.
